details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.3.1 Annotation types
details.description: Annotation types not defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 12.5.6.1, Table 171 shall not be permitted. Additionally, the Sound, Screen, Movie, 3D, RichMedia and FileAttachment types shall not be permitted.
